juzs.text: mariyu mam'malni kalusukovalasi undani asincanivaru ila annaru: "Devadutalu ma vaddaku enduku pampabadaledu? Leda memu ma prabhuvunu enduku cudalemu?" Vastavaniki, varu tamanu tamu cala goppavariga bhavincaru mariyu varu talabirusutananlo cala mitimiri poyaru
a roju varu devadutalanu custaru; aroju aparadhulaku elanti subhavartalu undavu mariyu varu (devadutalu) ila antaru: "Miku subhavartalanni khaccitanga nisedhincabaddayi
Mariyu memu, varu (avisvasulu) cesina karyala vaipuku maralutamu, taruvata vatini suksmakanala vale (dhuli vale) eguravestamu
a dinamuna svarganiki ar'hulaina varu manci nivasanlo mariyu uttama visranti sthalanlo untaru
mariyu (jnapakamuncukondi) a roju akasam meghalato saha braddalu ceyabadutundi. Mariyu devadutalu varusaga dimpabadataru
a roju vastavamaina visva samrajyadhipatyam kevalam a ananta karunamayunide! Satyatiraskarulaku a dinam ento kathinamainadiga untundi
mariyu (jnapakamuncukondi), a dinamuna durmargudu tana cetulanu korukkuntu ila antadu: "Ayyo! Nenu sandesaharuni margam anusariste, enta bagundedi
ayyo! Na daurbhagyam! Nenu phalana vanini snehituniga cesukokunda vunte enta bagundedi
vastavaniki atade, hitabodha (khur'an) na vaddaku vaccina taruvata kuda, nannu dani nundi tappincadu! Vastavaniki saitan manavuni yedala nam'makadrohi
appudu sandesaharudu ila antadu: "O na prabhu! Niscayanga, na jativaru i khur'an nu purtiga vadali pettaru
mariyu i vidhanga memu aparadhula nundi prati pravaktaku satruvulanu niyamincamu. Mariyu ni prabhuve, niku margadarsakudiga mariyu sahayakudiga calu

mariyu satyatiraskarulu antaru: "Itani (muham'mad) mida i khur'an purtiga okesari enduku avatarimpajeyabadaledu?" Memu (i khur'an nu) i vidhanga (bhagaluga pampindi) ni hrdayanni drdhaparacadaniki mariyu memu dinini kramakramanga avatarimpajesamu
mariyu varu ni vaddaku (ninnu vyatirekincataniki) elanti upamananni teccina! Memu niku daniki saraina javabu mariyu uttamamaina vyakhyanam ivvakunda undamu
Evaraite, vari mukhala mida (borla padaveyabadi) lagutu narakanlo kudabetta badataro, alanti varu ento dusthitilo mariyu margabhrastatvanlo padi unnavaru
mariyu niscayanga, memu musaku granthanni prasadincamu mariyu atani sodarudaina harun nu ataniki sahayakuniga cesamu
variddarito ila annamu: "Miriddaru ma sucanalanu asatyalani tiraskarincina jati vari vaddaku vellandi." Taruvata memu (a jati) varini purtiga nasanam cesamu

ika nuh jati varu: Eppudaite varu pravaktalanu asatyavadulani tiraskarincaro, memu varini munci vesi, sarvajanulaku varini oka sucanaga cesamu. Mariyu durmargula koraku memu vyadhabharitamaina siksanu sid'dha parici uncamu
mariyu ide vidhanga ad mariyu samud mariyu ar ras's prajalu mariyu vari madhya enno tarala varini (nasanam cesamu)
mariyu varilo prati okkarini memu drstantalanu icci naccajeppamu. Civaraku prati okkarini purtiga nirmulincamu

mariyu memu darunamaina (ralla) varsam kuripincina (lut) nagaram mida nundi vastavaniki varu (avisvasulu) prayanam cesi untaru. Emi? Varu danini (dani sthitini) cudatam leda? Vastavaniki, varu tirigi bratikinci lepabadatarani nam'maledu
(o muham'mad!) Varu ninnu cusinappudalla ninnu parihasalaniki guri cestu ila antaru: "Emi? Itaninena, allah tana sandesaharuniga cesi pampindi

memu vati (ma devatala) patla (drdhavisvasam mida) sthiranga undakapote, itanu mam'malni ma devatala nundi tappinci duram cesevade!" Mariyu tvaralone varu ma siksanu cusinappudu evaru margam tappi unnaro telusukuntaru
(O muham'mad!) Evadu tana manovanchalanu tanaku daivanga cesukoni unnado, alanti vanini nivu cusava? Nivu alanti vaniki raksakudavu kagalava
leka variloni cala mandi vintarani leda artham cesukuntarani nivu bhavistunnava? Asalu varu pasuvula vanti varu. Ala kadu! Varu vati kante ekkuva dani tappina varu
emi? Nivu cudatam leda? Ni prabhuvu! E vidhanga chayanu podigistado? Okavela ayana korite, danini nilipivesi undevadu, kani memu suryunni daniki margadarsiga cesamu
taruvata memu danini (a nidanu) kramakramanga ma vaipunaku lakkuntamu
mariyu ayana (allah) ye mi koraku ratrini vastranganu (teraganu), nidranu visranti sthitiganu mariyu pagatini tirigi bratikinci lepabade (jivanopadhi) samayanganu cesadu
mariyu ayana (allah) ye tana karunyaniki mundu galulanu subhavartaluga pampevadu mariyu meme akasam nundi nirmalamaina nitini kuripince varamu
dani dvara oka mrta pradesaniki pranam poyataniki mariyu danini memu srstincina enno pasuvulaku mariyu manavulaku tragataniki
mariyu vastavaniki, memu danini (nitini) vari madhya pancamu, varu (ma anugrahanni) jnapakamuncukovalani; kani manavulalo cala mandi dinini tiraskarinci, krtaghnulavutunnaru
mariyu memu talucukunte, prati nagaranikoka heccarika cesevanini (pravaktanu) pampi undevaramu
kavuna nivu (o pravakta!) Satyatiraskarula abhiprayanni laksyapettaku mariyu dini (i khur'an) sahayanto, (variki hitabodha ceyataniki) gattiga patupadu

Mariyu rendu samudralanu kalipi uncina vadu ayane! Okatemo rucikaramainadi, daham tircunadi, marokatemo uppaganu, ceduganu unnadi mariyu ayana a rendinti madhya oka adduteranu - avi kalisi pokunda - avarodhanga erparacadu
mariyu ayane nitito manavunni srstincadu. Taruvata ataniki tana vansa bandhutvanni mariyu vivaha bandhutvanni erparacadu. Mariyu vastavaniki ni prabhuvu (pratidi ceyagala) samardhudu
mariyu varu allah nu vadali tamaku labham gani, nastam gani, cekurcaleni varini aradhistunnaru. Mariyu satyatiraskarudu tana prabhuvuku virud'dhanga, (saitanuku toduga) untadu
mariyu (o muham'mad!) Memu ninnu oka subhavartaharuniga mariyu heccarika cesevaniga matrame pampamu
kavuna nivu varito anu: "Dinikai (i pracaranikai) mito elanti pratiphalamu nadagatam ledu. Kevalam, tanu korina vyaktiye tana prabhuvu marganni avalambincavaccu
kavuna ennadu maranincani, a sajivuni (nityuni) painane adharapadi undu mariyu ayana stotranto patu ayana pavitratanu koniyadu. Tana dasula papalanu erugutaku ayane calu

ayane akasalanu mariyu bhumini mariyu vati madhya unna samastanni aru dinamulalo (ayyam lalo) srstinci, taruvata tana sinhasananni (ars nu) adhisthincadu. Ayana ananta karuna mayudu, ayana ghanatanu gurinci erigina vadini adugu

mariyu varito: "A karunamayuniki sastangam (sajda) ceyandi." Ani annappudalla, varantaru: "A karunamayudevadu? Miru ajnapincina vaniki memu sastangam (sajda) ceyala?" Mariyu adi (ni pilupu) vari vyatirekatanu marinta adhikame cesindi
Akasanlo naksatrarasulanu (burujulanu) nirminci andulo oka (prakasince) suryunni mariyu velugunicce (pratibimbimpa jese) candrunni niyamincina ayana (allah) subhadayakudu
mariyu ayane, reyimbavallanu okadani venta okati anukramanga vaccetatlu cesevadu, ivanni gamaninca gorina vari koraku leda krtajnata cupagorina vari koraku unnayi
mariyu vare, ananta karunamayuni dasulu, evaraite bhumi mida namratato nadustaro! Mariyu murkhulu varini palukarinci nappudu: "Miku salam!" Ani antaro
mariyu evaraite, tama prabhuvu sannidhilo sastangam (sajda) cestu mariyu (namaj lo) nilabadutu ratrulu gaduputaro
mariyu evaraite: "O ma prabhu! Ma nundi narakapu siksanu tolagincu. Niscayanga, dani siksa edategani pidana" ani antaro
niscayanga, adi ati cedda asrayam mariyu nivasa sthalam
mariyu evaraite kharcu cesetappudu anavasara kharcu gani leka lobhatvam gani ceyakunda, i rendinti madhya mitanga untaro

mariyu evaraite, allah to patu itara daivalanu aradhincaro! Mariyu allah nisedhincina e pranini kuda n'yayaniki tappa camparo! Mariyu vyabhicaraniki palpabadaro. Mariyu i vidhanga cesevadu (avidheyudiga pravartincevadu) dani phalitanni tappaka pondutadu
punarut'thana dinam nadu, ataniki rettimpu siksa padutundi mariyu atadu andulone avamananto sasvatanga padi untadu
kani, ika evaraite (tamu cesina papalaku) pascattapa padi, visvasinci satkaryalu cestaro! Alanti vari papalanu allah punyaluga marcutadu. Mariyu allah ksamasiludu, apara karuna pradata
mariyu evadaite, pascattapa padi satkaryalu cestado! Niscayanga alanti vadu hrdayapurvakanga allah vaipunaku pascattapanto maralutadu
Mariyu evaraite, abad'dhamaina saksyam ivvaro! Mariyu vyarthamaina panula vaipu nundi povatam jarigite, sanskaravantuluga akkadi nundi datipotaro
mariyu evaraite, tama prabhuvu sucanala (ayat la) hitabodha cesinapudu, varu daniki cevitivariga mariyu gruddivariga undiporo
mariyu evaraite, ila prarthistaro: "O ma prabhu! Ma sahavasula (ajvaj la) mariyu santanam dvara ma kannulaku calladanam prasadincu. Mariyu mam'malni daivabhiti galavariki nayakuluga (imamuluga) ceyi
ilanti vare tama sahanasilataku pratiphalanga (svarganlo) unnata sthananni pondevaru. Akkada variki gauravamaina svagatam mariyu santi labhistayi
varandu sasvatanga untaru. Adi enta manci nivasam mariyu enta manci sthalam

(o muham'mad! Avisvasulato) ila anu: "Miru ayananu prarthistunnaru kabatti na prabhuvu mim'malni alaksyam ceyadam ledu. Kani vastavaniki, ippudu miru (ayananu) tiraskarincaru. Kavuna tvaralone ayana siksa mipai anivaryamavutundi
ta - sin - mim
ivi spastamaina grantha sucanalu (ayatulu)
(o muham'mad) varu visvasincaledane badhato bahusa nivu ni pranale kolpotavemo
memu korite akasam nundi varipai oka adbhuta sanketanni (ayat nu) avatarimpajesi, daniki vari medalanu namratato vangi poyela cesevaramu
mariyu vari vaddaku ananta karunamayudani vadda nundi krotta sandesam vaccinappudalla, varu dani nundi vimukhulu kakunda undaledu
vastavaniki, ippudu varu tiraskarincaru, kani tvaralone varu egatali cestu vaccina dani yatharthamemito variki telisipotundi
emi? Varu bhumi vaipu cudaleda? Memu danilo enta puskalanga sresthamaina rakarakala (jivarasulni) puttincamo
Niscayanga, indulo oka sucana undi. Ayina varilo cala mandi visvasincadam ledu
mariyu niscayanga, ni prabhuvu kevalam ayane, sarvasaktimantudu, apara karuna pradata
mariyu ni prabhuvu musanu ila adesincina visayanni variki jnapakam ceyincu: "Durmargulaina jati prajala vaddaku vellu
phir'aun jativari vaddaku. Emi? Variki daivabhiti leda
(musa) annadu: "O na prabhu! Varu nannu asatyavantudavani tiraskaristaremonani nenu bhayapadutunnanu
na hrdayam kuncincuku potondi mariyu na naluka tadabadutondi, kavuna nivu harun vaddaku kuda (vahi) pampu
mariyu vari daggara na mida oka neram mopabadi unnadi, kavuna varu nannu camputaremonani bhayapadutunnanu
(allah) selaviccadu: "Atlu kaneradu! Miriddaru ma sucanalato vellandi. Niscayanga, memu kuda mito patu undi sarvamu vintu untamu
kavuna miriddaru phira'aun vaddaku velli anandi: "Niscayanga, memu sarvalokala posakuni sandesaharulamu
kavuna israyil santati varini ma venta ponivvu
(phir'aun) annadu: "Emi? Memu ninnu balyanlo mato patu posincaleda? Mariyu nivu ni vayas'suloni aneka sanvatsaralu mato patu gadipavu kada
ayina nivu hinamaina a pani cesavu, kavuna nivu krtaghnulaloni vadavu
(musa) annadu: "Nenu porapatuga a pani cesanu
a pidapa miku bhayapadi paripoyanu, kani a taruvata na prabhuvu naku vivekanni prasadinci, nannu sandesaharulalo cercukunnadu
ika nivu naku cesina a upakaraniki nannu etti podiste! Nivu matram israyil santati varinanta banisaluga cesukunnavu kada
(phir'an) adigadu: "Ayite i sarvalokala prabhuvu ante emiti
(Musa) javabiccadu: "Miru nam'mevare ayite! Ayane akasalaku mariyu bhumiki mariyu vati madhya unna samastaniki prabhuvu
(phir'aun) tana cuttu unna varito: "Emi? Miru vintunnara?" Ani prasnincadu
(musa) annadu: "Ayana (allah) mi prabhuvu mariyu mi purvikulaina mi tatamuttatala prabhuvu kudanu
(phir'aun) annadu: "Mi vaddaku pampabadina mi i sandesaharudu niscayanga piccivade
(musa) annadu: "Miru artham cesukogaligite! Ayane turpu padamaralaku mariyu vati madhya unna samastaniki prabhuvu
(phir'aun) annadu: "Nivu nannu kadani marevarinaina aradhya daivanga cesukunte nenu ninnu cerasalalo unnavarito cercutanu
(musa) annadu: "Emi? Nenu ni vaddaku oka spastamaina visayanni (satyanni) tisukuvaccina taruvata kudana
(phir'aun) annadu: "Nivu satyavantudave ayite danini (a adbhuta sucananu) cupu
appudu (musa) tana ceti karranu padaveyagane, adi oka spastamaina pedda sarpanga maripoyindi
taruvata atanu (musa) tana cetini (canka nundi) velupaliki tiyagane, adi cusevari yeduta tellaga prakasincasagindi
(phir'aun) tana cuttu unna nayakulato annadu: "Niscayanga, itanoka nerpu gala mantrikudu
itanu tana mantrajalanto mim'malni mi desam nundi taruma gorutunnadu, ayite mi salaha emiti
varannaru: "Atanini mariyu atani sodarunni api uncu mariyu (mantragallanu) samavesa paracataniki anni nagaralaku vartaharulanu pampu
varu ni vaddaku nerpugala prati mantrikunni testaru
i vidhanga oka niyamita rojuna oka niyamita pradesanlo mantrikulanta samavesa paracabaddaru
mariyu prajalato ila prasnincadam jarigindi: "Emi? Miranta samavesamayyara
okavela mantrikulu gelupondite manamanta varini anusarincali kada
Mantrikulu vaccina taruvata phir'aun to annaru: "Memu gelupondite niscayanga maku bahumana mundi kada
(phir'aun) annadu: "Avunu! Niscayanga, appudu miru na sannihitulalo cerutaru
musa varito annadu: "Miru visara dalucukunna danini visarandi
appudu varu tama trallanu mariyu tama karralanu visiri ila annaru: "Phir'aun sakti saksiga! Niscayanga meme vijayam pondutamu
a taruvata musa tana karranu padaveyaga, taksaname adi vari butakapu kalpanalanu mringi vesindi
appudu a mantrikulu sajdalo paddaru
varannaru: "Memu sarvalokala prabhuvunu visvasistunnamu
musa mariyu harun la prabhuvunu

(phir'aun) annadu: "Nenu miku anumati ivvaka munde miru itanini visvasincara? Niscayanga, itade mi guruvu, miku jalavidyanu nerpinavadu. Sare! Ippude miru telusukuntaru. Nenu mi vyatireka (pratipaksa) disala cetulanu mariyu kallanu narikistanu mariyu mirandarini siluvapai ekkistanu
(mantrikulu) annaru: "Badha ledu! Niscayanga, memu ma prabhuvu vaddake kada maralipoyedi
niscayanga, ma prabhuvu ma papalanu ksamistadani memu asistunnamu, endukante vastavaniki andari kante munduga visvasincina varam meme
mariyu memu musaku i vidhanga divyajnanam (vahi) pampamu: "Nivu na dasulanu ratrivela tisukoni vellipo niscayanga, miru vembadincabadataru
taruvata phir'aun anni pattanalaku vartaharulanu pampadu
(ila prakatana ceyincadu): "Vastavaniki viru (i israyil santati varu) oka cinna tegavaru matrame
mariyu niscayanga, varu maku cala kopam teppincaru
mariyu niscayanga, manam aikamatyanto undi jagarukata cupevaramu
kavuna memu varini, totala nundi mariyu celamala nundi vellagottamu
Mariyu kosagarala nundi mariyu unnatamaina sthanala nundi kuda
i vidhanga! Memu israyil santati varini, vatiki varasuluga cesamu
appudu (phir'aun jati) varu suryodaya kalamuna (israyil santati) varini vembadincaru
a irupaksala varu okarinokaru eduru padinappudu, musa anucarulu annaru: "Niscayanga memu cikki poyamu
(musa annadu): "Atlu kaneradu! Niscayanga, na prabhuvu nato unnadu. Ayana naku margadarsakatvam cestadu (margamu cuputadu)
appudu memu musaku: "Ni ceti karrato samudranni kottu!" Ani vahi dvara telipamu. Appudadi hatattuga cilipoyindi, dani pratibhagam oka maha parvatam madiriga ayipoyindi
mariyu akkadiki memu rendava paksam varini samipimpa jesamu
mariyu musanu mariyu atanito patu unnavarini andarini raksincamu
a taruvata migata varinandarini munci vesamu
niscayanga, indulo oka sucana undi. Ayina varilo cala mandi visvasincatam ledu
mariyu niscayanga, ni prabhuvu kevalam ayane, sarvasaktisampannudu, apara karuna pradata
ika variki ibrahim gathanu vinipincu
atanu tana tandrito mariyu tana jati varito: "Mirevarini aradhistunnaru?" Ani adiginapudu
varannaru: "Memu vigrahalanu aradhistunnamu mariyu memu vatike ellappudu bhaktulamai untamu
(ibrahim) annadu: "Miru vitini pilicinappudu ivi mi mora alakistaya
leda, mikemaina melu ceyagalava? Leda hani ceyagalava
varannaru: "Ala kadu! Memu ma tandritatalanu ila cestu undaga cusamu
atanu annadu: "Emi? Miru eppudaina alocincara? Mirevarini aradhistunnaro
miru gani mariyu mi purvikulaina mi tatamuttatalu gani (alocincara)
Endukante! Niscayanga, ivanni na satruvule! Kevalam a sarvalokala prabhuvu tappa
ayane nannu srstincadu. Kabatti ayane naku margadarsakatvam cestadu
ayane naku tinipincevadu mariyu tragincevadu
mariyu nenu vyadhigrastudanaite, ayane naku svasthata niccevadu
mariyu ayane nannu maranimpajesevadu, taruvata malli bratikimpajesevadu
mariyu ayane tirpudinamuna na tappulanu ksamistadani memu asistunnanu
mariyu o na phrabhu! Naku vivekanni prasadincu mariyu nannu sadvartanulalo kalupu
mariyu taruvata vacce tarala varilo naku manci perunu prasadincu
mariyu sarvasukhala svarganiki varasulayyevarilo nannu cercu
mariyu na tandrini ksamincu. Niscayanga, atadu margabhrastulaloni vade
mariyu andaru tirigi bratikimpabade roju nannu avamanam pala ceyaku
e rojunaite dhanasampattulu gani, santanam gani panikiravo
kevalam nirmalamaina hrdayanto allah sannidhilo hajarayyevadu tappa
mariyu (a roju) svargam daivabhiti galavari daggaraku tisuku rabadutundi
mariyu narakam margam tappina vari mundu pettabadutundi
mariyu varito anabadutundi: "Miru aradhincevaru (a daivalu) ippudu ekkadunnaru
allah nu vadali (miru vatini aradhincaru kada!) Emi? Varu miku sahayam ceyagalara? Leda tamaku tamaina sahayam cesukogalara
appudu varu mariyu (varini) margam tappincina varu, andu (narakam) loki visiriveyabadataru
mariyu varito batu iblis sainikulandaru
varu parasparam vadincukuntu ila antaru
allah saksiga! Memu spastamaina margabhrastatvanlo padi unnamu
eppudaite memu mim'malni sarvalokala prabhuvuto samanuluga cesamo
mariyu mam'malni margabhrastuluga cesindi kevalam i aparadhule
Makippudu sipharasu cesevaru evvaru leru
mariyu e prana snehitudu kuda ledu
okavela malli maralipoye avakasam maku doriki unte, memu tappakunda visvasincina varilo ceripotamu
niscayanga, indulo oka sucana undi. Ayina varilo cala mandi visvasincatam ledu
mariyu niscayanga, ni prabhuvu kevalam ayane, sarvasaktimantudu, apara karuna pradata
nuh jati, sandesaharulanu asatyavadulani tiraskarincindi
vari sahodarudu nuh varito ila annappudu: "Emi? Miku daivabhiti leda
niscayanga, nenu mi vaddaku pampabadina visvasaniyudaina sandesaharudanu
kavuna miru allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi
nenu dani koraku mi nundi elanti pratiphalanni adagatam ledu. Na pratiphalam kevalam sarvalokala prabhuvu vaddane unnadi
kavuna miru allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi
varannaru: "Emi? Memu ninnu visvasincala? Ninnu kevalam adhamulaina vare kada anusaristunnadi
(nuh) annadu: "Varemi (panulu) cestu undevaro nakem telusu
vari lekka kevalam na prabhuvu vadda undi. Miridi artham cesukunte enta bagundedi
mariyu nenu visvasince varini dhikkarince vadanu kanu
nenu kevalam spastanga heccarika cesevadanu matrame
varannaru: "O nuh! Nivu dinini manukokapote, nivu tappaka rallu ruvvi campabadatavu
(nuh) annadu: "O na prabhu! Na jati prajalu nannu asatyudavani tiraskaristunnaru
kavuna nive naku mariyu variki madhya tirpu ceyi. Mariyu nannu mariyu nato patu unna visvasulanu kapadu
a pidapa memu atanini mariyu atanito pata nindunavalo ekki unna varinandarini kapadamu
a taruvata migata varinandarini munci vesamu
Niscayanga, indulo oka sucana undi. Ayina varilo cala mandi visvasincadam ledu
niscayanga, ni prabhuvu kevalam ayane, sarvasaktimantudu, apara karuna pradata
ad jati, sandesaharulanu asatyavadulani tiraskarincindi
vari sahodarudu hud varito ila annappudu: "Emi? Miku daivabhiti leda
niscayanga, nenu mi vaddaku pampabadina visvasaniyudaina sandesaharudanu
kavuna miru allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi
nenu dani koraku mi nundi elanti pratiphalanni adagatam ledu. Na pratiphalam kevalam sarvalokala prabhuvu vaddane unnadi
emi? Miru kevalam adambaraniki prati ettaina sthalam mida oka smarakanni nirmistara
mariyu miru sasvatanga ikkade undipotarannatlu peddapedda kotalu kadatara
mariyu miru evarinaina pattukunte, ati krurulai pattukuntara
ikanaina miru allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi
mariyu miku telisivunna (manci) vastuvulanu, miku vistaranga iccina ayana (allah) yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi
ayana vistaranga miku pasuvulanu mariyu santananni anugrahincadu
mariyu totalanu mariyu celamalanu
niscayanga, mipai oka maha dinamuna (padaboye) siksaku nenu bhayapadutunnanu
varannaru: "Nivu upadesincina, upadesincaka poyina maku anta samaname
idi ma purvikula yokka pracina acarame
mariyu maku elanti siksa vidhincabadadu
i vidhanga, varu atanini asatyavadudani tiraskarincaru. Kavuna memu varini nasimpajesamu. Niscayanga indulo oka sucana undi. Ayina varilo cala mandi visvasincatam ledu
niscayanga, ni prabhuvu kevalam ayane, sarvasaktimantudu, apara karuna pradata
samud jati, sandesaharulanu asatyavadulani tiraskarincindi
Vari sahodarudu salih varito ila annappudu: "Emi? Miku daivabhiti leda
niscayanga, nenu mi vaddaku pampabadina visvasaniyudaina sandesaharudanu
kavuna miru allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi
nenu dani koraku mi nundi elanti pratiphalanni adagatam ledu. Na pratiphalam kevalam sarvalokala prabhuvu vaddane unnadi
emi? Mirippudu ikkada unna sthitilone sukhasantulalo ellappudu vadali veyabadatarani anukuntunnara
totalalo mariyu celamalalo
mariyu i polalalo, magina pandlaguttulu gala kharjurapu cetla madhya
mariyu miru kondalanu tolici ento nerputo grhalanu nirmistu untarani
ala kadu, allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi
mariyu mitimiri pravartince vari ajnalanu anusarincakandi
evaraite bhumilo kallolam rekettistunnaro mariyu ennadu sanskarananu cepattaro
varannaru: "Niscayanga, nivu mantrajalanto vasaparacukobaddavu
nivu kevalam ma vanti oka manavudavu matrame! Kavuna nivu satyavantudave ayite, edaina adbhuta sucana tisukura
(salih) annadu: "Idigo i ada onte. Idi niru trage (dinam) mariyu miru niru trage dinam nirnayincabaddayi
diniki hani kaligincakandi. Ala ceste oka maha dinapu siksa mim'malni pattukuntundi
kani varu dani venuka kali mokali pedda naramunu kosi camparu, a taruvata varu pascattapa padatu undipoyaru
kavuna, varini siksa pattukundi. Niscayanga, indulo oka sucana undi. Ayina varilo cala mandi visvasincatam ledu
niscayanga, ni prabhuvu kevalam ayane, sarvasaktimantudu, apara karuna pradata
lut jati, sandesaharulanu asatyavadulani tiraskarincindi
vari sahodarudu lut varito ila annappudu: "Emi? Miku daivabhiti leda
Niscayanga, nenu mi vaddaku pampabadina visvasaniyudaina sandesaharudanu
kavuna miru allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi
nenu dani koraku mi nundi elanti pratiphalanni adagatam ledu. Na pratiphalam kevalam sarvalokala prabhuvu vaddane unnadi
(prakrtiki virud'dhanga) sarvapranulalo kella mire purusula vaddaku potaremiti
mi prabhuvu, mi koraku sahavasulu (ajvaj) ga puttincina varini vidici pedutunnaremiti? Ala kadu, miru haddu miri pravartince jativaru
(daniki) varannaru: "O lut! Ika nivu manukoka pote nivu desam nundi bahiskarincabadina varilo cerutavu
(lut) annadu: "Niscayanga mi i cestanu asahyincukune varilo nenu unnanu
(ila prarthincadu): "O na prabhu! Nannu mariyu na kutumbam varini viri cesta nundi kapadu
kavuna memu atanini mariyu atani kutumbam varinandarini kapadamu
venuka undi poyina varilo kalasi poyina musalame tappa
a taruvata, migata varini nirmulincamu
varipai oka varsanni kuripincamu. Adi (mundu) heccarincabadina varipai (kuripincabadda) ati bhayankaramaina varsam
niscayanga, indulo oka sucana undi. Ayina varilo cala mandi visvasincadam ledu
mariyu niscayanga, ni prabhuvu kevalam ayane, sarvasaktimantudu, apara karuna pradata
vana (ay kah) vasulu sandesaharulanu asatyavadulani tiraskarincaru
su'aib varito ila annadu: "Emi? Miku daivabhiti leda
niscayanga, nenu mi vaddaku pampabadina visvasaniyudaina sandesaharudanu
kavuna miru allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi mariyu nannu anusarincandi
nenu dani koraku mi nundi elanti pratiphalam adagatam ledu. Na pratiphalam kevalam sarvalokala prabhuvu vaddane unnadi
Miru (iccinapudu) sarigga kolici ivvandi. Nastaparice varilo cerakandi
trasuto sarisamananga tucandi
prajalaku vari vastuvulanu tagginci ivvakandi. Bhumilo kallolam rekettistu daurjan'yaparuluga pravartincakandi
mim'malni mariyu miku purvam gatincina tarala varini srstincina ayana (allah) yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi
varannaru: "Niscayanga, nivu mantrajalanto vasaparacukobaddavu
nivu kevalam ma vanti oka manavudavu matrame! Niscayanga, memu ninnu asatyavadulalo okaniga pariganistunnamu
nivu satyavantudave ayite akasam yokka oka tunakanu mapai padaveyi
(su'aib) annadu: "Miru cesedi na prabhuvuku baga telusu
kani, varu atanini asatyavadudani tiraskarincaru, kavuna varipai chayakrta upadravam (meghala siksa) vacci padindi. Niscayanga, adoka bhayankaramaina dinapu siksa
niscayanga, indulo oka sucana undi. Ayina varilo cala mandi visvasincatam ledu
mariyu niscayanga, ni prabhuvu kevalam ayane, sarvasaktimantudu, apara karuna pradata
mariyu niscayanga, idi sarvalokala prabhuvu avatarimpajesina (grantham)
dinini nam'madagina atma (ruhul amin) avatarimpajesadu
ni hrdayam mida, nivu heccarika cesevarilo ceripovalani
spastamaina arabbi bhasalo
niscayanga, dini (prastavana) purva divyagranthalalo undi
israyil santati variloni vidvansulu i visayanni oppu kovatam varikoka sucanaga saripoda
okavela memu dinini arab kani vanipai avatarimpajesi unte
atanu danini variki cadivi vinipincina, varu danini visvasincevaru karu
i vidhanga, memu dinini (tiraskaranni) aparadhula hrdayala loniki digipoyela cesamu
kathinasiksanu cudananta varaku varu dinini visvasincaru
adi variki teliyakundane akasmattuga vacci padutundi
Appudu varantaru: "Emi? Maku konta vyavadhi ivvabadutunda
emi? Ma siksa sighranga ravalenani varu korutunnara
cusava? Memu konni sanvatsaralu variki (i jivitanlo) sukhasantosalato gadipe vyavadhiniccina
taruvata vagdanam ceyabadinadi (siksa) varipaiki vaccinapudu
varu anubhavistu undina sukhasantosalu varikemi panikiravu
mariyu - heccarika cesevarini (pravaktalanu) pampanide - memu e nagaranni kuda nasanam ceyaledu
hitabodha nivvataniki; memu ennadu an'yayasthulamuga pravartincaledu
mariyu dinini (i divyagranthanni) tisukoni krindiki digina varu saitanulu karu
mariyu adi variki taginadi kadu; varadi ceyaleru
vastavaniki, varu dinini vinakunda duranga uncabaddaru
kavuna allah to patu maroka aradhya daivanni vedukoku, ala ceste nivu kuda siksimpabade varilo ceripotavu
mariyu ni daggari bandhuvulanu heccarincu
visvasulalo ninnu anusarince varipai ni kanikarapu rekkalanu capu
okavela varu ni patla avidheyata cupite varito anu: "Miru cese karyalaku nenu badhyudanu kanu
mariyu a sarvasaktimantudu, apara karuna pradata mida nam'makam uncuko
ayana nivu nilicinapudu, ninnu custunnadu
mariyu sastangam (sajda) cese varito ni rakapokadalanu kuda
niscayanga, ayane sarvam vinevadu, sarvajnudu
saitan lu evaripai digutaro nenu miku telupana
varu asatyavadulaina papatmulapai digutaru
gali vartalanu cevulalo udutaru; mariyu varilo cala mandi asatyavadule
mariyu margabhrastule kavulanu anusaristaru
emi? Niku teliyada? Niscayanga varu (kavulu) tama kavitvanlo prati visayanni uddesarahitanga (prasansistu) untarani
mariyu niscayanga, varu tamu acarincani danini ceppukuntarani

Kani, (varilo) visvasinci, satkaryalu cestu, allah nu amitanga smarince varu mariyu - tamaku an'yayam jariginappude - pratikara carya tisukune varu tappa! An'yayam cesevaru tama paryavasanam emito tvaralo telusukogalaru
ta-sin. Ivi divyakhur'an ayatulu mariyu idi oka spastamaina granthamu
ivi visvasulaku margadarsakatvam ganu mariyu subhavartalu iccevi ganu unnayi
evaraite namaj sthapistaro mariyu vidhidanam (jakat) istaro mariyu paraloka jivitanni nam'mutaro
niscayanga, evaraite paraloka jivitanni visvasincaro, variki memu vari cestanu akarsaniyamainaviga cesamu. Anduvalla varu andhula vale dari tappi tirugutu untaru
ilanti variki cedda siksa undi. Mariyu civaraku vare andari kante ekkuvaga nastapadevaru
mariyu (o muham'mad!) Niscayanga nivu i khur'an nu maha vivekavantudu, sarvajnudu ayina (allah) nundi pondutunnavu

(jnapakam cesukondi!) Musa tana intivarito: "Niscayanga naku oka agni kanipistondi. Nenu dani nundi mi vaddaku edaina vartanu tisuku vastanu leda miru kacukovadaniki mande korivinaina tisukuvastanu." Ani annadu
kani atadu akkadiki cerinappudu oka dhvani ila vinipincindi: "I agnilo unna vaniki mariyu dani parisaralalo unnavaniki subhalu kalugugaka! Sarvalokalaku prabhuvaina allah sarvalopalaku atitudu
o musa! Niscayanga ayana allah nu nene! Sarvasaktimantudanu, maha vivekavantudanu

ni cetikarranu padaveyi!" Atanu danini (padavesi) cusadu. Adi pamuvale kadalasagindi. Atadu venudirigi cudakunda parugettasagadu. (Allah annadu): "O musa! Bhayapadaku. Niscayanga, na sannidhilo sandesaharulaku elanti bhayam undadu
Kani evadaina tappu ceste tappa! A taruvata atadu daniki baduluga manci panulu ceste! Niscayanga, nenu ksamincevadanu, karuna pradatanu

ika ni cetini ni cankalo (jebulo) petti (tiyi), adi elanti lopam lekunda tellaga (prakasistu) bayatiki vastundi. I tom'midi adbhuta sucanalu (ayat) tisukoni nivu phira'aun mariyu atani jati vari vaddaku vellu. Niscayanga, varu avidheyulai poyaru
kani vari munduku ma pratyaksa sucanalu vaccinapudu varu: "Idi spastamaina mayajalame!" Ani annaru
mariyu vari hrdayalu vatini angikarincina varu an'yayanga, ahankaranto tiraskarincaru. Ika cudu a daurjan'yaparula gati emayi poyindo
mariyu vastavanga, memu davud mariyu sulaiman laku jnananni prasadincamu. Variddaru annaru: "Visvasulaina tana aneka dasulalo, ma iddariki ghanatanu prasadincina a allah ye sarvastotramulaku ar'hudu

mariyu sulaiman, davud ku varasudayyadu. Mariyu atanu (sulaiman) annadu: "O prajalara! Maku paksula bhasa nerpabadindi. Mariyu maku prati vastuvu osangabadindi. Niscayanga, idi oka spastamaina (allah) anugrahame
mariyu sulaiman koraku jinnatula, manavula mariyu paksula sain'yalu samikarimpabadi undevi. Taruvata vatini tama tama sthanala prakaram varusalalo petti (bayalu deraru)

civaraku varu cimala loyaku (kanumaku) cerukunnappudu oka cima ila annadi: "O cimalara! Miru mi indlaloki pravesincandi, lekapote sulaiman mariyu atana sainikulu - variki teliyakundane - mim'malni nalipi veyavaccu

(Sulaiman) dani matalaku cirunavvu navvi ila annadu: "O na prabhu! Nivu nannu - naku mariyu na tallidandrulaku cupina anugrahalaku - krtajnata telipevaniga mariyu niku nacce satkaryalu cesevaniga, protsahaparacu. Mariyu nannu ni karunyanto sadvartanulaina ni dasulalo cercuko
mariyu (okaroju) atanu paksulanu parisilistu ila annadu: "Emiti, naku vadrangi pitta (hud hud) kanipincadam lede! Adi ela adrsyamaipoyindi
nenu danini kathinanga siksistanu. Leda danini kosivestanu, adi naku saraina karanam cupitene tappa
a taruvata ento sepu gadavaka munde adi vacci ila annadi: "Niku teliyani visayamokati nenu telusukoni vaccanu. Nenu sabanu gurinci oka nam'makamaina vartanu ni koraku teccanu
niscayanga, nenu akkada oka strini cusanu. Ame varipai (raniga) paripalana cestundi. Ameku prati vastuvu osangabadi undi. Ame daggara oka goppa sinhasanam undi

mariyu nenu amenu mariyu ame jativarini allah nu vadali suryuniki sastangam (sajda) ceyatam cusanu mariyu saitan vari karmalanu, variki manciviga tocetatlu cesadu. Kavuna varini sanmargam nundi nirodhincadu, kabatti varu sanmargam pondaleka poyaru
anduke varu - akasalalonu mariyu bhumilonu dani vunna vatini bayatiki tisevadu mariyu miru dace vatini mariyu vyakta parice vatini eruguvadu ayina - allah ku sastangam (sajda) ceyatam ledu
allah! Ayana tappa maroka aradhya daivam ledu. Ayane sarvottama sinhasananiki (ars ku) prabhuvu
(sulaiman) annadu: "Nivu satyam palukutunnavo, leda abad'dhalade varilo cerina vadavo, memu ippude custamu
Na i uttaram tisukoni po! Dinini vari vadda padaveyi, taruvata vari nundi oka vaipuku tolagipoyi varemi samadhanamistaro cudu
(rani) annadi: "O na asthana nayakulara! Idigo na vaipuku oka visesamaina uttaram pampabadindi
niscayanga, idi sulaiman daggara nundi vaccindi. Mariyu idi: ''Ananta karunamayudu, apara karuna pradata ayina allah peruto,' prarambhincabadindi
(indulo ila vrayabadi undi): 'Na pai adhikyata cupakandi. Na sannidhiloki allah ku vidheyulu (muslinlu) ayi randi
(rani) annadi: "O nayakulara! I visayanlo miru naku salaha ivvandi. Nenu e visayanlonu, miru lenide elanti nirnayam tisukone
varila javabiccaru: "Manam cala balavantulam. Mariyu goppa yud'dha nipunulam, kani nirnayam matram nide! Kavuna, nivu emi ajnapinca dalacukunnavo alocincu
(rani) annadi: "Rajulu e desanlonaina jorabadinappudu, varandulo kallolam rekettistaru mariyu akkadi gauravaniyulaina prajalanu avamana parustaru. Viru kuda ade vidhanga ceyavaccu
kavuna nenu tappaka, vari vaddaku oka kanukanu pamputanu. A taruvata na dutalu emi javabu testaro custanu
(rayabarulu) sulaiman vaddaku vaccinapudu, atanu annadu: "Emi? Miru naku dhanasahayam ceyadalacara? Allah naku iccindi, miku iccina dani kante ento uttamamainadi, ika mi kanukato mire santosapadandi

(sulaiman) annadu): "Nivu vari vaddaku tirigipo, memu varipaiki goppa senalato vastamu. Varu vatini edirincajalaru. Memu varini parabhavinci accati nundi vedala godtamu. Mariyu varu avamanitulai undipotaru
(taruvata sulaiman) ila annadu: "O nayakulara! Varu allah ku vidheyulai (muslinlai) rakamunde, ame sinhasananni na vaddaku milo evaru tegalaru
Jinnatulalo balisthudaina okadu ila annadu: "Nivu ni sthanam nundi levaka munde nenu danini tisukuvastanu. Niscayanga nenu ila cese balam galavadanu, nam'madagina vadanu

granthajnanam gala okatanu ila annadu: "Nenu kanureppapatu kalanlo danini ni vaddaku tegalanu!" A taruvata (sulaiman) danini vastavanga tana mundu pettabadi undatanni cusi ila annadu: "Idi na prabhuvu anugraham. Nenu krtajnatalu cupuduna leka krtaghnuda navuduna ani pariksincataniki ila ceyabadindi. Krtajnatalu telipevadu, niscayanga, tana melu korake krtajnatalu telupukuntadu. Kani evadaina krtaghnataku palpadite, niscayanga, na prabhuvu svayam samrd'dhudu, parama data (ani telusukovali)
(sulaiman) annadu: "Ame gurtinca lekunda ame sinhasanapu rupanni marci veyandi. Manam cuddam! Ame margadarsakatvam pondutunda, leka margadarsakatvam pondani varilo ceri potunda

a taruvata ame akkadiki ragane: "Emi? Ni sinhasanam vidhangane untunda?" Ani adugga, ame: "Niscayanga, idi dani madirigane undi!"Ani annadi. Mariyu (sulaiman annadu): "Manaku ime kante mundu (divya) jnanam prasadinca badindi (labhincindi) kavuna manam allah ku vidheyulam (muslinlam) ayyamu
mariyu allah nu vadali ame aradhistunnadi, amenu (islam nundi) tolagincindi. Anduke! Ame vastavaniki, satyatiraskarulalo ceri undedi

Ameto: "Rajagrhanlo pravesincu!" Ani ceppaga! Ame danini cusi, adoka niti kolanani bhavinci (tana vastralanu) paikettaga ame pikkalu kanabaddayi. Appudu (sulaiman): "Idi gajuto nirmincabadina nunnani nela matrame!" Ani annadu. (Rani) annadi: "O na prabhu! Naku nenu an'yayam cesukunnanu. Mariyu nenu sulaiman to patu sarvalokala prabhuvaina allah ku vidheyatanu (islannu) svikaristunnanu
mariyu vastavanga! Memu samud jativari vaddaku vari sodarudaina salih nu: "Miru allah ne aradhincandi." Ane (sandesanto) pampamu. Kani varu rendu vargaluga cili poyi parasparam kalahincukosagaru
(salih) annadu: "O na jati prajalara! Miru susthitiki mundu dusthiti koraku enduku tondarapedutunnaru? Miru allah nu mi tappulanu ksamincamani enduku vedukoru? Bahasa miru karunincabadavaccu
varannaru: "Memu ninnu mariyu ni anucarulanu apasakunapu sucanaluga pariganistunnamu!" (Salih) annadu: "Mi sakunam allah vadda undi. Vastavaniki, miru pariksinca badutunnaru
mariyu a nagaranlo tom'midi mandi undevaru. Varu desanlo kallolam rekettistu undevaru. Mariyu elanti sanskarana cesevaru kadu

varu parasparam ila anukunnaru: "Allah pai pramanam cesi ila pratijna ceyandi. Manam atanipai mariyu atanito patu unna varipai ratrivela dadi ceddamu. Taruvata atani varasulato: 'Mi sambandhikulanu vadhincindi memu cudane ledu. Memu niscayanga, satyam palukutunnamu.' "Ani andamu
mariyu i vidhanga, varu pannagam pannaru mariyu memu kuda oka pannagam pannamu. Kani varikadi teliyadu
ika cudandi! Vari pannagapu paryavasanam emayindo! Vastavaniki memu varini mariyu vari vansam varinandarini sarvanasanam cesamu
Avigo vari grhalu! Varu cesina durmargalaku avi ela padupadi poyayo cudandi. Niscayanga indulo telusukune variki goppa sucana undi
mariyu visvasinci, daivabhiti kaligi unna varini memu kapadamu
mariyu lut nu (jnapakam cesukondi)! Atanu tana jati varito ila annappudu: "Emi? Miru bahiranganga aslila karyalu cestara
emi? Miru strilanu vadali purusula vaddaku, mi kama icchanu tircukovataniki potara? Vastavaniki, miru mudha janulu
